message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. It's a great deal for you considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I'm willing to come down a bit to $12,000.  This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to get closer to my target price.  What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $12,000. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. Can you meet me there?
